text: allaah hee hai, jo vaayuon ko bhejata hai, phir vah baadal uthaatee hain, phir vah use phailaata hai aakaash mein, jaise chaahata hai aur use ghanghor bana deta hai. to tum dekhate ho boondon ko nikalate usake beech se, phir jab use pahunchaata hai jise chaahata hai, apane bhakton mein se, to sahasa ve praphull ho jaate hen
